ComicInfo.Series: Resident Alien: The Book of Love
ComicInfo.Summary:
The agent who was trailing Harry tries to help him resolve his issues with the government, allowing things to quiet down a bit in Patience. Harry and Asta grow closer, romance blooms, and guards are let down. Life always has a way of keeping things exciting, and big things can happen in small towns! "One of the most charming and wonderful comics being published today." -Jeff Lemire
